original_text: And to the others he said in my hearing, “Pass through the city after him, and strike. Your eye shall not spare, and you shall show no pity.
korean_text: 그들에 대하여 내 귀에 이르시되 너희는 그를 따라 성읍 중에 다니며 불쌍히 여기지 말며 긍휼을 베풀지 말고 쳐서

sentences.original_text: And to the others he said in my hearing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 듣는 가운데 그가 다른 이들에게 말하기를

sentences.original_text: Pass through the city after him
and you shall show no pity
